chapter.text: 52|1|Yi shanyue mengshi,
52|2|yi tian jing zhi shu
52|3|xie yu zhankai de pizhi zhe mengshi,
52|4|yi zhong tianshi chaojin de tian fang mengshi,
52|5|yi bei sheng qi de cangqiong mengshi,
52|6|yi wangyang de dahai mengshi,
52|7|ni de zhu de xingfa, que shi yao shixian de,
52|8|shi renhe ren buneng dikang de.
52|9|Zai tianti zhendong,
52|10|shanyue shiqu zhi ri,
52|11|zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen,
52|12|ji yi wangyan xiaoqian de renmen!
52|13|Tamen jiang bei touru huo yu.
52|14|Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian suo fouren de huoxing.
52|15|Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian ne?
52|16|Nimen jin huo yu qu ba! Nimen renshou qizhong de xingfa yu fou, sui nimen de fangbian, na duiyu nimen shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou.
52|17|Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan he enze zhong,
52|18|tamen yin zhu de shangci er kuaile, tamen de zhu shi tamen de mian yu liehuo de xingfa.
52|19|Nimen yin ziji de xingwei er yukuai de chihe ba!
52|20|Tamen kao zai fen lie chengxing de chuangshang, wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi zuo tamen de banlu.
52|21|Ziji xindao, zisun ye genzhe xindao zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun yu tamen tong ji, wo bu jianshao tamen de shangong yi sihao. Mei ren yingdui ziji de xingwei fuze.
52|22|Wo jiang yi tamen suo shihao de shuiguo he roushi gongji tamen,
52|23|tamen zai leyuan zhong hu di (yin) bei, tamen bu yin'er chu e yan, ye bu yin zhi er fanzui e.
52|24|Tamen de tongpu lunliuzhe fushi tamen, naxie tongpu, haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
52|25|Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun,
52|26|tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqian women wei ziji de jiashu que shi zhanzhanjingjing de,
52|27|dan an la yi shi en yu women, bing shi women de mian yu du feng de xingfa.
52|28|Yiqian women que shi changchang qidao ta, ta que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.”
52|29|Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jie ni de zhu de endian, ni bushi yige zhanbu zhe, ye bushi yige feng ren.
52|30|Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta shi yige shiren, women dengdai ta zaofeng eyun.”
52|31|Ni shuo:” Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yitong dengdai de.”
52|32|Nandao tamen de lizhi mingling tamen shuo zhe ju hua ma? Buran, tamen shi fangdang de minzhong.
52|33|Nandao tamen shuo ta ceng niezao ta ma? Buran, qishi shi tamen bu gui xin.
52|34|Jiao tamen zuochu xiang zheyang de wenci lai, ruguo tamen shi shuo shihua de!
52|35|Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao chulai ne? Haishi tamen ziji jiushi chuangzao zhe ne?
52|36|Nandao tamen cengjing chuangzao tiandi ma, buran, shi tamen bu quexin an la.
52|37|Shi ni de zhu de kucang gui tamen zhangguan ne? Haishi tamen shi naxie kucang de jiandu ne?
52|38|Nandao tamen youyi jia tianti, keyi deng shangqu qingting ma? Jiao tamen zhong de qingting zhe na yige mingzheng lai ba!
52|39|Nandao an la you nu'er, nimen you erzi ma?
52|40|Nandao ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, gu tamen wei nashui er danfu tai zhong?
52|41|Nandao tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu neng jiang ta ji zhu xialai?
52|42|Nandao tamen yu yong jimou ma? Buxindao zhe, jiang zi zhong qi ji.
52|43|Nandao chu an la wai, tamen hai you bie de shenling ma? An la shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.”
52|44|Ruguo tamen kanjian tian diao xialai yikuai, tamen jiang shuo:“Zhe shi cheng dui de yuncai.
52|45|Ni ren sui tamen ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu ziji bei zhen si de rizi.
52|46|Zai na ri, tamen de jimou, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu shou yuanzhu.
52|47|Bu yi de renmen, zai na ri zhiqian, biding yao shou yi zhong xingfa, dan tamen daban bu zhidao.
52|48|Ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de qinyan juangu zhi xia de. Ni qilai de shihou, yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
52|49|zai yejian he zai xingsu moluohou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
